page.title: 04Family Life In Mayfield.
page.content: Mrs Instone wakes at 7am,awakens her 2 children Alice & Sam,& the house begins to bustle with activity.Mr. Instone has already left for work.Sam, after dressing,lays the breakfast table.Mrs.Instone takes Florin,the dog,for a short walk,then feeds the hens & rabbit.After breakfast the children get ready for school,scramble into the car,& arrive at school by 9am.Mrs. Instone shops in Mayfield before going home to do the 'chores'. After lunch she takes Florin for a good walk.At 3.30.pm the children are collected from school.Alice & Sam play & watch T.V.then visit their Grandma before supper at 6pm.Mr Instone arrives home.After supper the children play cricket with Daddy,before their bath.Alice practises on the piano before a story and bed.
